snippet: Michael Williams, who has led the company since the government took it over, said Tuesday that he would step down after a successor was found.
abstract: Michael J Williams, who has led mortgage giant Fannie Mae since 2009 after the government took over, announces that he will step down as its chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Michael Williams, who has led the company since the government took it over, said Tuesday that he would step down after a successor was found.

headline.seo: Fannie Mae Chief, Michael Williams, to Step Down
headline.main: Top Executive Announces Plan to Leave Fannie Mae
headline.print_headline: Top Executive Announces Plan to Leave Fannie Mae

keywords.value: Federal National Mortgage Association Fannie Mae
keywords.name: organizations
